about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for the F2P game ‘Gemini: Binary Conflict’ created as a value add for those who want to support our projects. It features the games main theme and reinforcement wave music, as well as some additional bonus tracks which were created for and considered during development but never made it into the final game for one reason or another.

The soundtrack contains five standard high quality 320 kbps MP3’s as well as ultra quality lossless 24bit/192kHz WAV equivalents for the audiophiles among us.

The soundtrack contains five standard high quality 320 kbps MP3’s as well as ultra quality lossless 24bit/192kHz WAV equivalents for the audiophiles among us.
name: Gemini: Binary Conflict - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 655 MB available space
